Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with delays from the area of Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with delays from the area of Harlem. We are moving and crews are working to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
